name: LINKED (itch) (batuaytemiz)
description:
Your Move is Their Move! Try to stay alive as long as possible and beat the high score.

How to Play:

Gamplay:

LINKED is developed by Batu Aytemiz (Game Design, Programming, Visuals), Sercan Muhlacı (Programming) and Ezgi Katı (Sound).

Due the theme of GMTK Jam 2020, Out of Control, we tried to develop an arcade experience like Super Hexagon (2012) and Tilt to Live (2010).

We glad to thank the members of ÜNOG Gamedev Community!
